name: Poultry-Price-Optimization Development App
description: Data & Model Building to Find Optimum Price which maximizes Revenue for a SKU

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "Columns", "columns": [ { "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Poultry Price Optimization Analytic App

IE

Overview

The Retail Optimal Pricing Analytical app lets you upload your retail data for easy pricing optimization. It analyzes sales volume, retail and competitor pricing, and market share to train a model. The app then forecasts prices and volumes and calculates SKU-specific Price Elasticity to guide optimal pricing decisions. This helps maximize your market share and revenue efficiently. oultry

Key Features

  • + Effortlessly upload your Secondary Report Poultry File to get started with pricing optimization.
  • + The app analyzes critical factors such as Weekly Sales Volume, Poultry Pricing, Competitor Pricing, and Market Share Value to build a robust model.
  • + It trains on your data to suggest the most effective pricing model tailored to your business needs.
  • + Provides precise forecasts for future sales volumes and optimal pricing points.
  • + Calculates the Price Elasticity for each SKU, helping you make informed and strategic pricing decisions to optimize revenue.

Key Insights

  • + Automatically derive new data features from your existing dataset to enhance model accuracy and insights.
  • + Evaluate and select the most effective pricing model from the available options tailored to your data.
  • + Display a ranked leaderboard of models, showcasing their performance and helping you choose the top contender.
  • + Generate detailed predictions of how future pricing will impact sales volume, aiding in strategic planning.
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html1", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Retail Price Optimization Analytic App

IE

Overview

The Retail Optimal Pricing Analytical app lets you upload your retail data for easy pricing optimization. It analyzes sales volume, retail and competitor pricing, and market share to train a model. The app then forecasts prices and volumes and calculates SKU-specific Price Elasticity to guide optimal pricing decisions. This helps maximize your market share and revenue efficiently.

Key Features

  • + Effortlessly upload your Secondary Report Retail File to get started with pricing optimization.
  • + The app analyzes critical factors such as Weekly Sales Volume, Retail Pricing, Competitor Pricing, and Market Share Value to build a robust model.
  • + It trains on your data to suggest the most effective pricing model tailored to your business needs.
  • + Provides precise forecasts for future sales volumes and optimal pricing points.
  • + Calculates the Price Elasticity for each SKU, helping you make informed and strategic pricing decisions to optimize revenue.

Key Insights

  • + Automatically derive new data features from your existing dataset to enhance model accuracy and insights.
  • + Evaluate and select the most effective pricing model from the available options tailored to your data.
  • + Display a ranked leaderboard of models, showcasing their performance and helping you choose the top contender.
  • + Generate detailed predictions of how future pricing will impact sales volume, aiding in strategic planning.
  • + Analyze how changes in price affect demand with clear visualizations of Price Elasticity for each SKU.

appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Price Optmization Data Exploration

Overview

  • + In this section, users can thoroughly review the dataset's features and their corresponding derived methods. A visual representation illustrating the correlation with the primary features is also provided at this stage, offering a comprehensive overview.

Feature Columns & Their Description

FIELD NAME DESCRIPTION
Year_Week52 Weeks Year Starting From Monday, Grouped at SKU
SALES_VOLUMEMEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
PACK_PRICE_PRDMEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR1MEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR2MEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR3MEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR4MEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR5MEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
ADV_SPENDSUM aggregated based on YYYY-WW
BAUSUM aggregated based on YYYY-WW
EVENTSUM aggregated based on YYYY-WW
FLEETINGSUM aggregated based on YYYY-WW
SVDSUM aggregated based on YYYY-WW
LOG_SALES_VOLUMENatural logarithm
LOG_PRD_PRICENatural logarithm
LOG_WEEK_MIN_PACK_PRICE_PRDNatural logarithm
PRD_CDSKU
SIZEDefault size value of the SKU
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html2", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Price Optmization Data Exploration

IN

Overview

In this section, users can thoroughly review the dataset's features and their corresponding derived methods. A visual representation illustrating the correlation with the primary features is also provided at this stage, offering a comprehensive overview.

Feature Description and Calculation Methods

FIELD NAME DESCRIPTION METHOD USED
Year_Week Year and week number in the format YYYY-WW 52 Weeks Year Starting From Monday, Grouped at SKU
SALES_VOLUME Volume of sales MEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
PACK_PRICE_PRD Price of a pack of Product MEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR1 Price of a pack of COMPETITOR 1 MEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR2 Price of a pack of COMPETITOR 2 MEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR3 Price of a pack of COMPETITOR 3 MEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR4 Price of a pack of COMPETITOR 4 MEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR5 Price of a pack of COMPETITOR 5 MEAN aggregated based on YYYY-WW
ADV_SPEND Amount spent on search advertising SUM aggregated based on YYYY-WW
BAU Business as Usual SUM aggregated based on YYYY-WW
EVENT Event SUM aggregated based on YYYY-WW
FLEETING Fleeting Sales SUM aggregated based on YYYY-WW
SVD Sales Value Day SUM aggregated based on YYYY-WW
LOG_SALES_VOLUME Natural logarithm of sales volume Natural logarithm
LOG_PRD_PRICE Natural logarithmic value of Product pack price Natural logarithm
LOG_WEEK_MIN_PACK_PRICE_PRD Natural logarithmic value of Weekly Minimum Product pack price Natural logarithm
ITEM Items SKU
PRD_CATEGORY Product Category Different Prodict Category

appStages.name: Prediction
appStages.stageDetails:
{"components":[{"label":"HTML","attrs":[{"attr":"","value":""}],"content":"

Forecast Latest Demand & Revenue

","refreshOnChange":false,"key":"html","type":"htmlelement","input":false,"tableView":false},{"label":"Container","customClass":"card p-2","tableView":false,"key":"container","type":"container","input":true,"components":[{"label":"HTML","attrs":[{"attr":"","value":""}],"content":"

App Guidelines

  • + Browse for File: Click on the "Browse" link located under the "Load File" section
  • + Model Prediction: Click on the "Get Prediction" button to get the Revenue versus Price visualization graph and the Maximum price, revenue and RPI's against the product.
  • + Business Validation: Finally, the "Run Laddering" button will use the model prediction data to optimize the revenue based on the laddering method.
